pullrequest.title: Keep the playmode combo box in sync with the current playmode, fixes #22

content.raw:
Ah, looks like you're right. That actually makes a large part of my code changes unnecessary. :)

I hadn't looked into `OnGameState()` more closely, I just saw that what's sent to it was already a formatted string, and assumed it's used like that directly (I wanted to avoid having to parse the playmode out of it again, which doesn't seem very elegant, but it seems that's already being done).

I think it might make sense to address #23 in a separate pull request since it's a different issue and I have a few more changes in mind that I described there.
